SENT.plain: Behçet's disease is a complex vasculitis of unknown etiology
Abundant neutrophils suggest the involvement of innate immunity
Cytokines are skewed to the T-helper-1 pattern
Few sterile organs are easily accessible for analysis in Behçet's disease
Cañete and coworkers identify inflamed joints as a feasible model and suggest the involvement of innate immunity in Behçet's disease
